description: Erection of a single storey rear and infill extension with decking, erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden of the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered location plan, 19533-401-01,19533-402-01 and design and access statement- received 10/02/20
19533-101-0, 19533-102-01, 19533-201-01, 19533-202-01, 19533-301-01, 19533-103-01, 19533-104-01, 19533-203-01, 19533-302-01, 19533-105-01- 20/04/20) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than those specified on the plans hereby approved or such uses which are incidental to the house at [7 Lateward Road, TW8 0PJ].  For the avoidance of doubt the building shall not be used as a living room, bedroom, kitchen or as a separate unit of accommodation, nor for business purposes.
Condition : 6 - The height of the decking hereby approved shall not exceed 0.3 metres.
